# 9.0 Docs

## Serialization

- [BinaryFormatter always throws](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/9.0/binaryformatter-removal.md): Learn about the .NET 9 breaking change in serialization where the in-box BinaryFormatter implementation was removed and always throws exceptions.
- [Nullable JsonDocument properties deserialize to JsonValueKind.Null](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/9.0/jsondocument-props.md): Learn about the breaking change in serialization in .NET 9 where nullable JsonDocument values deserialize to JsonValueKind.Null instead of null.
- [System.Text.Json metadata reader now unescapes metadata property names](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/9.0/json-metadata-reader.md): System.Text.Json now unescapes metadata property names, affecting reference preservation and metadata property validation.
